name: The world most annoying keyboard!
description:
This is V1 of the world's most annoying keyboard!

keyboard-super-v69420 is a new and inelegant keyboard designed to help you! type as fast as the speed of sound! it has lots of features that definitely can't backfire, it's not programmed to do bad and most importantly it will never hurt you!

so come-on he won't bite! come try it out and get on your typing game and take it to the next level today!

have fun...and good luck....you'll need it... or not!

DISCLAIMER:

if you download this and run it you know what's coming but don't worry you can end it by just typing yes in the terminal or just closing the terminal
